name: Pet of the Week – Spike
description: Meet Spike, this week's Pet of the Week! Spike is a laid-back pup who recently found his new forever family.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Spike, this week’s Pet of the Week! Spike is a laid-back pup who recently found his new forever family. If you are interested in adopting a new pet like Spike, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
